name: 3 Card Online Reading
description:
3, in numerology, is the number of creation, the triad, creative communion. 

This super-affordable 3-card reading will be simple enough to get straight down to the point, but insightful enough to give detail into whuteva' it is you need insight about. The price of this reading so affordable, yet it doesn't lack quality AT ALL. 

YOU GET A FULL PAGE AND A HALF OF INSIGHT, PER QUESTION, WITH FULL COLOR PICTURES OF YOUR CARDS! FEEL FREE TO E-MAIL ME WITH ANY FOLLOW UPS YOU MAY HAVE.
It's my goal to help.

Depending on the type of question (romance, finances, education etc.), I will use a custom spread just for your needs!


You can choose your number of questions in the drop-down menu right down there. Yeah, there. :)

name: 5 Card Online Reading
description:
This insightful and inexpensive reading is all about getting bang for your buck.

You will receive the tarot's insight to one or more questions, using 5 cards to make your reading as detailed and insightful as possible. Be it love, career, spirituality or school, we can be sure to look at things in depth with this reading.




**After purchasing, please type your question for in the paypal "leave seller a note" section!

YOU GET A FULL 2 PAGES AND A HALF OF INSIGHT, PER QUESTION, WITH FULL COLOR PICTURES OF YOUR CARDS! Sometimes, if the cards/cosmos have a lot to say, I'll have 3-4 pages on info for you. I'll personally correspond with you via e-mail for follow-ups to any questions ya' got! It's my goal to help. 


E-mails are sent via a PDF file.




You can choose your number of questions in the drop-down menu right down there. Yeah, there. :)

name: "Primal Triad" Astrology Reading (Sun Sign, Moon Sign, Rising Sign)
description:
Okay, you know your Sun sign.
You were born May 30th, you're a Gemini.
October 4th? Libra.
January 27, Aquarius.

But do you also know your MOON sign? what about your Rising sign (ascendant)? What the hell do those things have to do with you?

This combination of the "Sun", "Moon" and "Ascendant" in astrology is the basic pyramid (primal triad) that your personality rests on.

Your Sun sign is the basis of who you are and what you stand for. Your sun sign is what wakes you up in the morning, what gives you the virility and vitality to see another day (the SUN).

Your moon sign describes your emotional needs, intuition, fears, and the overall way life FEELS to you, especially in the dark corners of the night (MOON), where all defenses are down.

Your Ascendant or rising sign, is the mask you wear for society, the outward "vehicle" that you express through, personal style; pretty much, the way you interact with people on the surface, and express the other signs of yourself through.

Let this 3 PAGE, PERSONALIZED full color photo reading give you insight on how to navigate, integrate, and harmonize these pieces of yourself (which sometime exist in total conflict with each other. Is your mind telling you NO, but your body, your body telling you YES?

It might be because of your stars :). Let's see how we can fix that.


*You will be contacted within 24 Hours of purchase for inquiry of info. I need your BIRTH DATE, TIME, AND PLACE in order to give the most detail about your primal triad. If you want, you can also get specific as to what aspect of life you want to look into ($,<3, à«, etc)

**"BUT OCTOBER, I DONT KNOW WHAT TIME I WAS BORN!"
 Well, although the time gives hella more info about you, and is so much more accurate, i can still read it, just choose the "No Birth Time" in the "Options" drop-down menu below. Note that not having the time can result in a kinda vague reading, which I hate to give, as well as making it a Primal "DUO", because you need a birth time for the ascendant.





My sun is in Libra (The Artist)
My moon is in Taurus (with the soul of the Peaceful one)
and I have Sag' Rising! (Wearing the mask of the Gypsy!)
:) Bless Up.


*Credit Given to Steven Forrest for "Primal Triad".

name: SUPERDEEP Detailed Reading (8+ Cards)
description:
This one RIGHT HERE.

This one consists of a spread of, at the very least, 8 cards to answer your specific burning question.

This one here, gets in to super specific detail, with an introspective spread to help delve SUPERDEEP into the bottom of your question. Folks that tend to do a lot of spiritual and introspective soul-searching are in love with this option.

This reading doesn't skim the surface of anything. With this one, we get deep into the issue, leaving no stone unturned, and nothing is overlooked (I have a lotta planets in Scorpio :P). Because of this, I recommend this reading for those that are looking to fight some inner demons (so to speak), or deal with some serious issues of love, life, or anything*.

This reading can be 4-5 Pages long, with full color photos of the spread and cards.


You can choose your number of cards in the drop-down menu right down there. Yeah, there. :)



*Please remember to read my policies.

name: 20 Minute Phone Reading
description:
If you're a phone person, then this option is perrrrfect for you.

What do you get? A 20 minute phone conference with you, me, and the tarot. What's your burning question? Whether its relationship, career, money, or spirituality, the tarot can provide the insight you seek. I am also big on giving practical advice as well.

**Readings are 20 minutes/Question. You can choose your number of questions in the drop-down menu right down there. Yeah, there. :)

*Write your question in the PayPal "Notes to seller" option. You will be contacted within 24 hours for correspondence, triple OG'.
